Part 8.Reason: These assays are important for assessing cell proliferation, an aspect that may be relevant depending on the functional outcomes you wish to explore in your liposarcoma study.

Part 9.Title: Transwell Assays
Part 9.Reason: Transwell assays can provide insights into cell migration and invasion, which may be relevant depending on the aspects of liposarcoma progression you wish to study.
